mapper.select: SELECT id, name, url, logo_url, description, created_at, updated_at FROM featured_sites ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO featured_sites(name, url, logo_url, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{name}, #{url}, #{logoUrl}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE featured_sites SET name = #{name}, url = #{url}, logo_url = #{logoUrl}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
